mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Berthault, Pierre Gabriel, 1737-1831
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Notre-Dame de Paris (Cathedral)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bénédiction des drappeaux de la garde nationale Parisienne à Notre Dame Blessing the flag of the Parisian national guard at Notre Dame
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Military ceremony within a large, columned hall with four rows of soldiers on each side of the hall holding several flags. A group of men walk together in between the soldiers
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: George Mason University Libraries Special Collections Research Center
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Broadus Bailey French Revolution Print Collection
